# room

**Instance Property**

The room containing the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var room: HMRoom? { get }
```

## Discussion

Assign accessories to new rooms using [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/assignAccessory(_:to:completionHandler:)].

## Locating an accessory

- **HMRoom**: The smallest subdivision of a home’s space.
